column4: my windows computer's battery died today and i was stuck with a computer that only had linux and i couldn't even do simple thing like use vncviewer
do you have a support question?
it's no hard, I used to use it all the time, what issue were you having with it (wouldn't open, too complicated, etc)?
ubuntu does not use exe installers, please open the "software center" and search for "vncviewer" then click "install"
